str2: Joshua -- 'the LORD is salvation', Moses' successor, also the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Piel - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular | third person masculine singular
str2: To kneel, to bless God, man, to curse
Caleb -- a son of Jephunneh and sent by Moses to spy out the land
Jephunneh -- father of Caleb, also an Asherite

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular

str2: Hebron -- 'association, league', a city in southern Judah
Something inherited, occupancy, an heirloom, an estate, patrimony, portion
